abstract: Nevada’s attorney general wants to end a broad mortgage agreement it struck with Bank of America in 2008.
snippet: Nevada’s attorney general wants to end a broad mortgage agreement it struck with Bank of America in 2008.
lead_paragraph: The attorney general of Nevada is accusing Bank of America of repeatedly violating a broad loan modification agreement it struck with state officials in October 2008 and is seeking to rip up the deal so that the state can proceed with a suit against the bank over allegations of deceptive lending, marketing and loan servicing practices.

headline.main: Nevada Says Bank Broke Mortgage Settlement
headline.print_headline: Nevada Sees Violations Of Mortgage Agreement
